suite.name: TS-SIT-001

test.name: Test Case 1: Login with invalid email on the web custom app

kw.name: Main Web Setup
Empty Directory
kw.doc: Deletes all the content from the given directory.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.msg: Keyword 'Set Screenshot Directory' found both from a custom library 'SeleniumLibrary' and a standard library 'Screenshot'. The custom keyword is used. To select explicitly, and to get rid of this warning, use either 'SeleniumLibrary.Set Screenshot Directory' or 'Screenshot.Set Screenshot Directory'.
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
This is the main setup for the connexi

kw.name: GIVEN I go to web login page
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: THEN Message should display in web
Page Should Contain
kw.msg: Current page contains text 'Invalid username or password.'.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Main Web Teardown
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
This is the main teardown for the web app
